text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As promised, I contact Smart<n>Falcon's teachers, notifying
them that<n>she'll be taking the day off. Together,<n>we then
head to Oi Racecourse.
choice_data_list: We're watching a dirt race today.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Ohhh, now I get it... but why today?<n>It's not like any big
races are going<n>on, and there aren't that many people<n>
either.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
You're trying to show me how great<n>dirt racing can be,
right? If that's the<n>case, why not take me to a more<n>
important race?
choice_data_list: Just watch. You'll see what I'm getting at.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The competition is incredibly fierce<n>today. Covered in dust
from head to<n>toe, every runner gives their all in the<n>race.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
They fight to eke out every last bit of<n>strength in their
bodies. The sight is<n>the furthest thing from pretty, and<n>yet—

text_block_list.name: Spectators
text_block_list.text: C'mon! You can do it! Let's goooo!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Ah! Oh no! Look out! She's<n>gonna—ahhhh!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Captivated by the runners' passion<n>to win, the small
audience erupts into<n>a cacophony of roars. Eventually...

text_block_list.name: 1st Place Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Pant... pant... Thank you all forcheering so hard for me! I reallyappreciate the support!

text_block_list.name: 1st Place Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Pant... Phew... All right, let's finishthe day with a smile! Next up, ourwinning concert! As for the songwe'll be singing...

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Wow... That was amazing! Like,<n>beyond awesome even!
And their<n>concert was fantastic too!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
All the runners looked like they were<n>about to pass out... but
they pushed<n>through and kept going! Even though<n>they
got covered in dirt, they shone<n>like stars with the way they
rushed<n>across the track—

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Oh... I think I get it now. An Umadol<n>shines brightest when
she's doing<n>her best and running with everything<n>she's
got!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Their concert was all the more moving<n>because of how hard
they worked to<n>get there. They're exactly the kind of<n>
Umadol I want to be someday!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
I guess it doesn't matter if the course<n>is turf or dirt. You can
inspire your fans<n>either way! How could I have been so<n>
blind to that?

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: I just assumed that I wouldn't beable to move my audience if I ran indirt races, but I couldn't have been more wrong! Sigh... I'm honestlydisappointed in myself...
choice_data_list:
So you've changed your mind about running in
dirt races?

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Well, for the moment, all I can say is...<n>I'm glad I was able to
watch today's<n>race. I learned something important,<n>and I
also had a lot of fun!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
But I wouldn't have realized these<n>things without outside
help... It's still a<n>fact that people don't care as much<n>about
dirt races, so these winning<n>concerts probably fly under the
radar.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
And because they don't feature top<n>runners, they'll stay
unnoticed... It<n>feels like such a shame.
choice_data_list: Then all you have to do is raise the ceiling.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Huh? What do you mean?
choice_data_list:
There's more to dirt racing than just being
"suited" for it, right?

There's more to dirt racing than just being
"suited" for it, right?

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Oh... I get it now!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
You're right! All I need to do is make<n>dirt racing a place for
top racers<n>through my running, singing, and<n>dancing!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
I'll make it so more people want to<n>run in and watch dirt
races! I'll change<n>the racing world!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Wait... Isn't that super hard? Like,<n>harder than just
becoming a<n>world-class Umadol?

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha... I guess I shouldn't give up<n>just 'cause it's going
to be a<n>challenge, right? All that means is that<n>I need to try
harder than ever!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
But it doesn't matter how hard I try if<n>nobody knows who I
am! So the first<n>step toward my goal is to make<n>myself
known to the world!
choice_data_list: Keep it up, and your day will come!
Keep it up, and your day will come!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
"Keep it up?" I've gotta go above and<n>beyond or nothing will
change!<n>Especially in the marketing<n>department! ☆

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I shake my head. What she doesn't<n>know is that she's
already making<n>good progress. After all...
choice_data_list: I became your number one fan for a reason!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I remember when I first laid eyes<n>upon her. Her lone figure
sparkled<n>underneath the evening sun as she<n>danced and
sang before a backdrop<n>of vibrant orange.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
No one was watching. No one was<n>listening. And yet, she
smiled wide<n>and sang as if reaching out to an<n>audience of
thousands.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She filled me with hope and courage,<n>and I wouldn't trade
her for anyone<n>else in the world.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Oh wow...

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: ...Thank you.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Okay, I've got it! I know what I want<n>to do about my next
tryout race!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
A few months go by, and the first<n>batch of tryouts since I
started training<n>with Smart Falcon rolls around.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
All right, I'm gonna head out now! ☆<n>I'd better hear you
cheering me on! ☆

text_block_list.name: New Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Who's the new face? She looks<n>incredibly excited... I don't
think I've<n>ever seen her in a dirt race before.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The crowd's attention quickly shifts<n>to the more high-profile
runners. But<n>that's exactly what we need for her<n>to stand
out.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Phew... Hiyaaaa! ☆☆☆

text_block_list.name: Trainers
text_block_list.text: Wha... Whoa, she's fast!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Smart Falcon kicks up a storm of<n>dust, widening the gap
between her<n>and the other runners at an incredible<n>speed.
All eyes lock onto her.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha, it's so easy to run on dirt! But<n>I knew that! I've
always known that!<n>This...

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
This is my stage! This is where I<n>shine brightest! And I'm
finally ready<n>to sparkle! ☆☆

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Smart Falcon runs as freely as a bird<n>soaring through the
sky. The dirt<n>course is hers for the taking, and no<n>one else
even comes close.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Yaaay! I did it! I won! ☆☆

text_block_list.name: New Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
H-hey! Can I talk to you for a minute!<n>Who even are you?!
And where have<n>you been all this time?! Are you<n>looking
for a trainer? If you are...

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Awww, am I famous already? ☆<n>Sorry, but I'll have to get
back to you<n>on that!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Oh, there you are! I was looking for<n>you!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Thanks! ☆ Hey, how was I? Did I light<n>up the track?

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Ehehe... I'm glad. Anyway, let's talk.<n>There's something
I've been<n>meaning to ask you, so listen<n>carefully, okay?

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Will you be my trainer and help me<n>become the best Umadol
I can be?
choice_data_list: Of course, Falco! Let's do it!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Ehehe! Thanks so much! ☆☆

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Now that that's settled... Hello, my<n>fans—both old and new!
I'd like to<n>introduce myself one more time! ☆

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
What do you do when Falco runs?!<n>(Chase her! Chase her!)
Catch me<n>with hearts full of love! ☆ I'm Smart<n>Falcon, and
I'm the cutest Umadol<n>around! ☆

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
My dream is to become dirt racing's<n>top Umadol! And in
order to make my<n>dream come true, I need your<n>support!
So please...

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Show me your love and catch me if<n>you can! ☆ Ehehe! ♪
